make_datarow¶

tessilator.tessilator.make_datarow(t_target, scc, d_target, labels_cont)¶

Once the tessilator has analysed a target, the results are printed line by line to a table.

parameters¶

t_targetastropy.table.Table

The Gaia and contamination details (see ‘getGaiaData’ and ‘contamination’ functions in tessilator.tess_functions.)

d_targetdict

The dictionary containing details of the periodogram analysis, which is returned by ‘run_LS’ in tessilator.tess_functions.)

scclist, size=3

A list containing the Sector, Camera and CCD.

labels_contstr

A string of labels listing details of any contaminant sources.

returns¶

drdict

A dictionary entry for the target star containing tessilator data
